channel.title: Comments on: PostgreSQL Projects at Skype

item.title: By: Derek
item.dc:creator: Derek
item.description: It is good to see, and making their operating knowledge about Postgres public to teach the rest of us some stuff. It's also good to see a quality site running well on Postgres and making it publicly-known to spread the "Grespel" (gospel about Postgres--patent pending).
item.content:encoded: It is good to see, and making their operating knowledge about Postgres public to teach the rest of us some stuff. It’s also good to see a quality site running well on Postgres and making it publicly-known to spread the “Grespel” (gospel about Postgres–patent pending).
